name: Evercalm Barrier Support Face Oil
about: What it is:A clinically shown lightweight face oil to help care for and strengthen the skin barrier within seven days.*.Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Redness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:- Camellia Japonica Seed Oil: A precious oil that soothes skin and helps reduce signs of sensitivity..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Shown to reduce the seven signs of sensitivity in seven days, Evercalm Barrier Support Face Oil is enriched with seven nourishing oils to help prevent water loss and combat dryness. Itu2019s microbiome-friendly and formulated with 100 percent natural-origin ingredients for a hydrated and healthier-looking complexion. (*Proven by a clinical study of 50 women and men.).Clinical Results:In a clinical study, conducted on 50 women:
ingredients: -Camellia Japonica Seed Oil: A precious oil that soothes skin and helps reduce signs of sensitivity..-Inca Inchi Oil: A cold-pressed oilseed oil that helps to replenish the skin barrier..-Meadowfoam Seed Oil: Nourishes the skin with a velvety feel without greasiness...Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil, Oryza Sativa Germ Oil, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Bisabolol, Tocopherol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-In the morning and evening, warm five drops in the palm of your hand .-Apply by gently patting over the face, neck, and decollete...Recycling Instructions:.-Packaged in a recyclable* glass bottle. .-The dropper, made from postindustrial recycled plastic, is not currently recyclable; however, REN Clean Skincare is working on a long-term solution. .*Recycling is subject to local policies and facilities.

reviews.review_title: psoriasis eczema rosace? This literally saved my s
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually bought this with my own money. No incentive. Nothing to gain.No fake review. No troll review.  I have to say these things because I think authenticity is absolutely crucial for both customers and brands.   For context- I'm 45 yrs young. I never had to worry about ingredients on the back of skin care ... UNTIL 43 HIT!! My psoriasis and eczema came back  with a vengeance after being dormant for years (had it on arms and scalp). I now have some on my face with some rosacea (can't make this stuff up lol)  I had gone back to dermatology. Got proactive. learned both ingredients/ brands and how they were beneficial with my skin needs.Seems simple, right? It's not.   I have been using this very oil for 5 months day/night and still have about 3/4 left.  This Ren Elixir has seriously gave me back my skin,  my confidence, my glow, my youthfulness. it's hard to explain if you haven't experienced something on your face that's so visibly obvious..... then to come out the side of it, I just want to share!  **also, remember this is CLEAN skin care. it has fantastic ingredients with a purpose. If you're looking for perfume and highly fragranced scents in these types of brands and giving them poor reviews based on brands or products that's don't use the ingredients YOU want, is completely unfair.**
